name: Vanta
description:
VANTA is a two player local co-operative puzzle/exploration game set in a mysterious and unique universe. Explore an underground fallen civilization beautifully realised in stylized graphics. The original soundtrack and well composed soundscape makes for an immersive atmospheric experience. 

Use the contrast of shadow and light in order to solve puzzles and discover a world lost to the dark. Grab a friend and delve into the mysterious shadow realm, can you find the way back to the surface world?

 Play together as the butterfly of light and the moth of shadow. Through careful movement and positioning you can manipulate the rules of the world around you, use this to your advantage!

 The game requires at least one controller and keyboard input but using two controllers is recommended. 

This game was made by a group of students for a school project. Consider the current version a proof of concept and stay tuned for a fully realised experience in the future.
